content: description the moonstone throw crochet pattern is a fun beginner blanket with an easy color and stitch repeat the stripes are modern and fit with any home decor this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit through lionbrand com 2 it includes all the yarn you need to make the blanket + the pdf digital pattern you can customize your yarn color choices as well 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-moonstone-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/2h64h
